item.title: Albertsons sues Kroger, backs out of $25B merger after courts block the deal
item.description: Albertsons has filed a lawsuit against Kroger one day after federal judges blocked a potential $24.6 billion merger deal.

item.title: Biden calls Trump tariff approach 'a major mistake'
item.description: The president delivered remarks drawing a sharp contrast between his four years in office and President-elect Donald Trump’s past and future terms.
